text: nà nu ɠɔʋɛzu ʋele yooiti ma nuɓusɛiti kpein tolisu,› Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠana. ‹Nà nà-botiɠɛ nui Neɓukadenɛzaal lolisu, Ɓaɓilɔne masagi. Nà ʋaazu ga tiye zooi tɛi daalɔɠɔma, ta ná-nuɓusɛiti, ta zii ɠiligiti pɛ daalɔɠɔma ti maaɠoolii zu ɓalaa. Nà wo-ma zuwu ɠaaleʋe, wa-o, tiya-o. Nà niima yooi ɠoloɠolo, é la ɓɛtɛa eyɛsu ɠɔ, toɠa ɠɛ ga laavɔɔ vaa ta ɲɛɛɠulasu anii.
